__e: He had his fun hanging out with us, and then, "bye, I'm leaving."
Anyway, I'm sorry, but I still had a lot of fun with you.
I've had such a good time hanging out with you these last few days, I thought it would be fun to hang out even more and spend time with you.
I didn't even enjoy myself, you didn't make me laugh.
I haven't had this much fun spending the night with a woman, hell, ever.
No, seriously. When was the last time that you went out and had fun at a party with people you didn't know?
I had more laughs with Howie than anybody I ever worked with.
I've had a wonderful time just when I needed it.
If I thought like that, we wouldn't have had so much fun the first week.
